PAGE.p: This page presents a brief overview of some of the people involved in MTD development

div.p: David, also known by his alias "dwmw2", is the maintainer of MTD. He started MTD from scratch and is involved in almost everything about MTD
Thomas is working on NAND FLASH support and poking around in MTD in general
Nicolas works on CFI commandset and contributed XIP support
Joern hacks on JFFS2/JFFS3 and various bits of MTD.
Jarkko is the performance janitor of JFFS2
Artem is involved in JFFS2 and started the development of JFFS3 recently

Ferenc has rewritten the compression code of JFFS2 (not fully finished yet) and made mount time improvement called summary. It is included in JFFS3 and there is an unofficial patch for JFFS2, too. He works at the University of Szeged in Hungary, and there is a team behind him: Zoltan Sogor and Patrik Kluba.

PAGE.p: Vincent Sanders earns a credit for having the nice idea of a picture gallery of ARM Linux fellows, which I stole frivolously
